header.audience.title: Select a Group
header.audience.help: Choose one of your groups to discuss content with members.
header.content.title: Add Post
header.content.help: Discuss content within one of your groups.
groups.label: Select Group
public.label: Visible to Public
private.label: Group Members Only
org.label: Organization Members Only
post.title.label: Post Title (Optional)
post.body.label: Post Body (Required)
post.body.placeholder: What's on your mind? Type @ to mention someone.
error.title: Something went wrong
error.create: Please try again to create your post.
error.edit: Please try again to edit your post.
error.load.title: Failed to load recent groups
error.load: The groups in which you have recently posted are unavailable.
empty.title: Start a discussion
empty.message: Create your first post. It's easy to ask a question or share what you know with others.
confirm.body: Any updates will be discarded. Select "Back" to return to editing your reply.
post.title.validation.error: {characters, plural, =0 { # characters over max length } one { # character over max length. } other { # characters over max length. }}
location.heading: Add a location
location.text: Use the map tools to add a location to your post. Select an existing feature on the map, or draw a point, line, or area. Add (and edit) as many as needed.
